  文件已过期，代码已更新
    Public CO As New System.Text.UTF8Encoding
    Sub Main()
        Dim param As String
        Dim bs() As Byte
        Dim pwd As String
        Dim un As String
        If My.Application.CommandLineArgs.Count <> 2 Then
            MsgBox("语法:exe 用户名 密码")
        End If
        un = My.Application.CommandLineArgs(0)
        pwd = My.Application.CommandLineArgs(1)
        param = "username=" & un & "&hash=" & LCase(getMd5Hash(pwd)) & "&launcher=MCLauncherBN_CMD"
        bs = CO.GetBytes(param)
        Dim req As Net.HttpWebRequest = Net.HttpWebRequest.Create("http://www.minelogin.cc/ml/login.php")
        req.Method = "POST"
        req.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"
        req.ProtocolVersion = New Version("1.0")'核心是这里，minelogin不支持http1.1......
        req.ContentLength = bs.Length
        Dim reqStream As IO.Stream = req.GetRequestStream
        reqStream.Write(bs, 0, bs.Length)
        Dim wr As Net.WebResponse = req.GetResponse
        Dim R() As Byte
        Dim callback As AsyncCallback
        Dim returnValue As IAsyncResult
        Dim state As Object
        ReDim R(2)
        returnValue = wr.GetResponseStream.BeginRead(R, 0, 3, callback, state)
        wr.GetResponseStream.EndRead(returnValue)
        Select Case Val(CO.GetString(R))
            Case 0
                MsgBox("使用MineLogin时出现网络问题")
            Case 1
                MsgBox("MineLogin用户名或密码不合法")
            Case 2
                MsgBox("使用MineLogin时出现内部错误")
            Case 3
                MsgBox("MineLogin用户不存在,请注册")
            Case 4
                MsgBox("MineLogin需要验证")
            Case 5
                MsgBox("MineLogin密码错误,请使用MCLauncherBN重新初始化")
            Case 100
                Console.WriteLine("认证成功")
            Case Else
                MsgBox(CO.GetString(R))
        End Select
    End Sub
    Function getMd5Hash(ByVal input As String) As String
        Dim md5Hasher As New Security.Cryptography.MD5CryptoServiceProvider()
        Dim data As Byte() = md5Hasher.ComputeHash(Text.Encoding.Default.GetBytes(input))
        Dim sBuilder As New Text.StringBuilder()
        Dim i As Integer
        For i = 0 To data.Length - 1
            sBuilder.Append(data(i).ToString("x2"))
        Next i
        Return UCase(sBuilder.ToString())
    End Function复制代码
